page.title: 14BLACKO SPORTS DAY
page.content: Sports Day is an annual event on the first Saturday in June. It is a day on which families of the village get together to talk and have fun. The events that are held are different races for different ages. There is the egg and spoon race, the flat race, the three legged race and others. The long distance races are the Tower race and the Cross Country race. Around the race track are stalls with different games to suit everyone. This year the Mayor of Pendle opened the sports day, after a speech he set off the first race. Mr. Atkinson recived a trophy for his hard work on the sports day. Mr. Corcaron, a famous Pendle artist, painted a picture for first prize in the raffle. It was a very successful sports day, as usual!
